attributes.action: Reject and remove the petition titled "Compel all organizations using non-geographical numbers..."
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The petition as per above should be removed from this site or ignored on the grounds that it is not a thought out argument.

0870 numbers: If you live outside of a compainies home town/city and you called their geographical number you would STILL be charged national rate.

0845 numbers: If you live outside a companies home town/city, it would be CHEAPER to call an 0845 number than their geographical number!!!!

I think we are generally better off with these numbers.
